page.title: 01LANDSCAPE, LYNEMOUTH.
page.content: {Industry. } Ellington Colliery is the main industrial feature in our area. Most men from Lynemouth work at Ellington.{ { {Residential. The rest of the area is farmland,with residential areas at Lynemouth-built in 1923-and a large housing estate at Ellington. There is also a residential area at Cresswell, but there aren't many houses. There are 600 caravans making a holiday village, which has many amenities on site. There are more caravans on smaller sites im the area,including gipsy caravans on the seashore at Lynemouth. {Wetland.} More than half our block is wetland.
